31 contributorstranslationstiếng việtold ways lyricsverse 1

until a blade stuck in the left side of my chest
surprise

the storys mine

passin me by

im gonna say no way

not goin back to my old ways

not goin back to my old ways

verse 2
now i know whats good for me
all that i need

i fill the well with some water its overflowin
black into gold
who knew itd be so bright without the blindfolds
